text: "One in Ten" is a 1981 song by English band UB40. It was the second single from their second studio album Present Arms. It went to number 7 in the United Kingdom. It charted again in 1992 with 808 State remixed and released "One in Ten" as a single. This version went to number 17 in the United Kingdom and number 19 in Ireland. Category:1981 songs Category:UB40 songs
title: One in Ten
